components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Celcom Network in Malaysia

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Celcom Network in Malaysia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Celcom Network in Malaysia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: New WhatsApp Numbers Onboarding Experiencing Intermittent Failures

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an intermittent issue with the onboarding of new WhatsApp phone numbers. Users trying to register new WhatsApp phone numbers might experience errors that result in the onboarding process failing to complete. We are investigating the issue with our Meta partners and will provide another update on 01/03/2024 at 1:30 PM Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Onboard WhatsApp numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

The VinaPhone network in Vietnam is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 January 2023 at 09:00 PST until 03 January 2023 at 09:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from VinaPhone Vietnam handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France and Germany Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France and Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 January 2024 at 13:00 PST until 08 January 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France and Germany phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and Austria Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 January 2024 at 16:00 PST until 08 January 2024 at 16:15 PST. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body:
The Verizon network in United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 08 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from Verizon United States handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
08 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 09 January 2024 at 03:00 PST
09 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 10 January 2024 at 03:00 PST
10 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 03:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2024 at 02:00 PST until 09 January 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 31 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 10 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
15 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
17 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 17 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
22 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 22 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
24 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 24 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
29 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 29 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
31 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 31 January 2023 at 16:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 January 2024 at 23:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Bell Canada, Rogers Canada, Telus Canada
Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2024 at 16:00 PST until 16 January 2024 at 20:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 January 2024 at 10:00 PST until 12 January 2024 at 12:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap.
Lookup Identity Match.
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 January 2024 at 10:00 PST until 12 January 2024 at 12:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
